FAQ.question: How do I sign up as a recruiter or developer?
FAQ.answer: To sign up, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage. You will be prompted to select either 'Recruiter' or 'Developer' before completing the registration form with your personal details.

FAQ.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
FAQ.answer: If you forget your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.

FAQ.question: As a recruiter, how can I post a new job?
FAQ.answer: To post a job, log in as a recruiter and go to your dashboard. Under 'Jobs,' click 'Add New Job' and fill out the job description. You can upload a job file or select from existing job templates within your company.

FAQ.question: How does the job-candidate matching work?
FAQ.answer: Our system uses a matching algorithm that compares candidate profiles with job requirements, including skills and experience. Matched candidates are shown under each job listing in the recruiter's dashboard.

FAQ.question: Can I view only jobs that match my profile as a developer?
FAQ.answer: Yes. In the developer dashboard, you can view job listings that match your profile under the 'Matching Jobs' section. This list is updated based on your skills and experience.

FAQ.question: How do recruiters filter candidates for specific skills or experience?
FAQ.answer: Recruiters can use the filter options in the 'Candidates' section to narrow down results based on specific skills, years of experience, and location.

FAQ.question: Can developers update their profile information after registration?
FAQ.answer: Yes, developers can update their profiles anytime. Go to 'Profile' in the developer dashboard to edit your skills, experience, and upload a new CV if needed.

FAQ.question: What file types are supported for job descriptions and CV uploads?
FAQ.answer: Our system supports PDF, DOCX, and TXT file types for job descriptions and CV uploads to ensure compatibility and ease of use.

FAQ.question: How will I be notified about job matches?
FAQ.answer: When a job matches your profile, you will see it listed under 'Matching Jobs' in your developer dashboard. You may also receive an email notification if notifications are enabled.

FAQ.question: How do recruiters contact matched candidates?
FAQ.answer: Once a candidate is matched to a job, the recruiter can view their profile and send a message or email directly through the platform.

FAQ.question: Can I delete my account?
FAQ.answer: Yes. If you wish to delete your account, please go to 'Settings' and select 'Delete Account'. Note that this action is irreversible and will permanently remove all your data.

FAQ.question: What security measures are in place to protect my information?
FAQ.answer: We use encryption and secure login methods to protect user information. All data is stored in secure servers, and access is restricted based on user roles.
